basis: The user expresses clear intent to perform the suggested steps (50 ml now, 15-min check-in, possible meal-time sip, log intake, reminders) while acknowledging potential overwhelm, indicating a high likelihood of action with flexibility.
cognitive_dissonance: Tension between wanting to progress and fear/anxiety about increasing intake; preference for gradual steps vs potential pressure to escalate.
negative_thought_patterns: Catastrophizing about days being overwhelming; fear of failure; perfectionistic or all-or-nothing tendencies; self-criticism when feeling uncertain.
emotional_triggers: Anxiety spikes related to intake increases; heat-related discomfort; concern about not meeting self-imposed targets.
coaching_notes: Continue offering gentle, concrete plans and validate feelings. Emphasize micro-goals, optional pauses, and flexible pacing. Encourage brief check-ins and simple reminders to support steady progress without pressure.
